data.comment: The big names in today's match at Renato Dall'Ara have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Gianpaolo Calvarese, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 1, In Bologna Bologna drive forward through Andreas Olsen. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Rodrigo Palacio puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
That's a fine assist from Musa Barrow.
In the minute 3, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bologna.
Bologna's Musa Barrow gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lecce defender.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
In the minute 4, Andreas Olsen (Bologna) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
Lecce have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 5, Great finish from Roberto Soriano to give Bologna a 2-0 lead.
Great play from Musa Barrow to set up the goal.
Lecce are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 7, Bologna drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Rodrigo Palacio for Bologna drives towards goal at Renato Dall'Ara. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 9, Bologna have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
Bologna's Mattias Svanberg gets in a shot on goal at Renato Dall'Ara. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Lecce.
In the minute 10, Antonin Barak (Lecce) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Gianpaolo Calvarese awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 11, Can Lecce capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Bologna are pushing forward but Musa Barrow's finish is wide of the goal.
Lecce have a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Gianpaolo Calvarese awards Lecce a goal kick.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a Bologna throw-in in Lecce's half.
In the minute 19, Andreas Olsen (Bologna) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Bologna push forward at Renato Dall'Ara and Musa Barrow gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lecce defence.
Roberto Soriano (Bologna) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 23, Bologna push upfield but Gianpaolo Calvarese quickly pulls them for offside.
Lecce awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lecce's Filippo Falco breaks free at Renato Dall'Ara. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 24, Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
Important block from the Lecce defence as Ibrahima Mbaye fires in a strike for Bologna.
In the minute 26, Bologna are coming forward and Musa Barrow gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bologna.
Lecce have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Can Lecce get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bologna's half?
So close for Bologna as Musa Barrow's shot comes back off the post.
Goal kick for Lecce at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 31, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Bologna.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gianluca Lapadula of Lecce gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 32, Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
Lecce to take a throw-in in Bologna territory.
Free kick for Lecce in their own half.
In the minute 34, Gianpaolo Calvarese awards Bologna a goal kick.
Riccardo Saponara (Lecce) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in Lecce.
In the minute 36, Musa Barrow gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bologna.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bologna.
Throw-in for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 38, Bologna's Andreas Olsen is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
Free kick for Lecce in their own half.
In the minute 40, Bologna drive upfield and Rodrigo Palacio gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Lecce defender.
Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lecce's Marco Mancosu gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 43, Gianpaolo Calvarese awards Bologna a goal kick.
Rodrigo Palacio (Bologna) gets a yellow card.
Lecce drive upfield and Riccardo Saponara gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bologna defender.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
In Bologna, Gianluca Lapadula (Lecce) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Lecce have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Marco Mancosu puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-1.
The second-half has started.
In Bologna, Bologna push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 47, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Lecce close to the penalty box.
In Bologna Lecce attack through Marco Mancosu. The finish is off target, however.
Bologna have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Bologna.
Throw-in for Bologna in the half of Lecce.
Ball safe as Lecce is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 49, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Lecce in their own half.
Gianpaolo Calvarese awards Bologna a goal kick.
Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Lecce in their own half.
Filippo Falco hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Lecce in Bologna.
Lecce awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 53, Gianluca Lapadula (Lecce) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Lecce have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
Can Lecce get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bologna's half?
In the minute 55, Andreas Olsen (Bologna) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
Free kick for Lecce in their own half.
In the minute 56, Sinisa Mihajlovic is making the team's first substitution at Renato Dall'Ara with Andrea Poli replacing Mattias Svanberg.
Sinisa Mihajlovic (Bologna) is making a second substitution, with Riccardo Orsolini replacing Andreas Olsen.
Ladislav Krejci is on a sub for Mitchell Dijks for Bologna.
In the minute 58, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Lecce in their own half.
The away team have replaced Giulio Donati with Andrea Rispoli. This is the first substitution made today by Fabio Liverani.
Lecce make their second substitution with Jacopo Petriccione replacing Panagiotis Tachtsidis.
Lecce needs to be cautious. Bologna have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Lecce at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 60, The away team replace Riccardo Saponara with Zan Majer.
In the minute 61, Lecce pushes forward through Marco Mancosu, whose finish on goal is saved.
Bologna have a goal kick.
Free kick for Bologna in the half of Lecce.
In the minute 63, Gianpaolo Calvarese awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Lecce in their own half.
Lecce awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Lecce push forward at Renato Dall'Ara and Gianluca Lapadula gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Bologna defence.
Goal! Filippo Falco levels the match at 2-2.
Jacopo Petriccione instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 67, Lecce surge into the attack at Renato Dall'Ara but Gianluca Lapadula’s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
Bologna are caught offside.
In the minute 69, Lecce are whistled for offside.
Nicola Sansone is replacing Rodrigo Palacio for the home team.
Lecce awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 71, In Bologna a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Lecce's Filippo Falco gets in a shot on goal at Renato Dall'Ara. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Gary Medel (Bologna) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Bologna.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
Lecce awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Nicola Sansone (Bologna) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bologna.
Lecce's Marco Mancosu misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 76, Bologna have a goal kick.
Free kick Bologna.
Biagio Meccariello is on a sub for Nehuen Paz for Lecce.
In the minute 79, Bologna make their fifth substitution with Federico Santander replacing Roberto Soriano.
Corner awarded to Lecce.
Goal kick for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 81, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Lecce.
Throw-in for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Bologna's Musa Barrow attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 82, Gianpaolo Calvarese awards Lecce a goal kick.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Lecce in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bologna.
In the minute 85, Filippo Falco gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lecce.
Antonin Barak (Lecce) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Lecce have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
In the minute 86, Filippo Falco for Lecce drives towards goal at Renato Dall'Ara. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In Bologna Lecce drive forward through Jacopo Petriccione. His shot is on target but it's saved.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Ladislav Krejci.
In the minute 88, Can Lecce capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bologna's half?
In Bologna a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bologna’s Ladislav Krejci is on his feet again at Renato Dall'Ara.
Riccardo Orsolini (Bologna) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Nicola Sansone of Bologna gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Lecce goal kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 6 minutes of added time.
In Bologna, Musa Barrow of Bologna is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Important block from the Lecce defence as Riccardo Orsolini fires in a strike for Bologna.
Corner awarded to Lecce.
Federico Santander gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bologna.
Free kick for Bologna in the half of Lecce.
Gianpaolo Calvarese blows to end the match. The final score is 3-2.
Goal! Musa Barrow gives Bologna a 3-2 lead in Bologna.
Riccardo Orsolini with an assist there.
Andrea Rispoli (Lecce) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
